articles.author: Mark Hanrahan
articles.title: Pope Francis apologizes for slapping woman's hand after she grabbed him
articles.description: Pope Francis was pulled off balance by a woman and had to slap her hand in order to free himself during a New Year's Even event in St. Peter’s Square.
articles.content:
Pope Francis apologized for slapping the hand of a woman who grabbed him and pulled him off balance at a New Years Eve event in St. Peters Square.
Video from Vatican TV shows Francis, accompanied by what appear to be security officers, greeting pilgrims acro… [+1299 chars]

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Security tight, Jews gather at stadium for religious event
articles.description: A large gathering of Jews at MetLife Stadium will draw a significant security presence after recent anti-Semitic attacks in the New York City area
articles.content:
EAST RUTHERFORD, N.J. -- 
More than 92,000 Jewish people will congregate Wednesday at MetLife Stadium in New Jersey to celebrate the reading of the entire Talmud in an event called Siyum HaShas and will draw a significant security presence after recent anti-… [+966 chars]

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Family of 4, including twin boys, killed in Puerto Rico
articles.description: Authorities in Puerto Rico say a family of four, including twin boys, was shot to death inside their home in Puerto Rico after celebrating New Year's Eve
articles.content:
SAN JUAN, Puerto Rico -- 
A family of four, including twin boys, was shot to death inside their home in Puerto Rico after celebrating New Year's Eve, authorities said.
Police said the couple's 16-year-old son was seriously injured and is hospitalized.
The … [+790 chars]

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Man caught on video snatching woman from NYC subway train
articles.description: Police have arrested a man after a video surfaced showing him apparently trying to abduct a woman on the New York City subway
articles.content:
NEW YORK -- 
New York police arrested a man after a video surfaced showing him apparently trying to abduct a woman on the subway.
Sonny Alloway, 48, was charged with unlawful imprisonment on suspicion of grabbing a young woman and carrying her off a No. 6 t… [+916 chars]

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Greens likely to be in Austria's next coalition government
articles.description: Austria's main center-right party and the environmentalist Greens are likely to announce a coalition deal that would return ex-Chancellor Sebastian Kurz to power
articles.content:
BERLIN -- 
Austria's main center-right party and the environmentalist Greens are likely to announce a coalition deal Wednesday night that would return ex-Chancellor Sebastian Kurz to power.
The 33-year-old Kurz's People's Party embarked on negotiations with… [+1075 chars]

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: At least five shot at bar in West Virginia on New Year's Day
articles.description: News reports say at least five people were injured, some seriously, after being shot inside a bar early New Year's Day
articles.content:
HUNTINGTON, W. Va. -- 
News reports say at least five people were injured, some seriously, after being shot inside a bar early New Year's Day. 
Interim Police Chief Ray Cornwell of the Huntington Police Department told local news stations Wednesday that the… [+375 chars]

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Shelling hit school killing 6 in rebel-held Syrian village
articles.description: Syrian opposition activists say government forces have shelled a rebel-held village in the country's northwest, hitting a school and killing at least six people
articles.content:
BEIRUT -- 
Syrian government forces shelled a rebel-held village in the country's northwest on Wednesday, hitting a school and killing at least six people, opposition activists said.
The attack in Idlib province, the last rebel stronghold Syria, was part of… [+1618 chars]

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Pope: Sorry I lost patience with hand-shaker who yanked me
articles.description: Pope Francis has apologized for hitting the hand of a well-wisher who grabbed him and yanked him toward her
articles.content:
VATICAN CITY -- 
Pope Francis has apologized for hitting the hand of a well-wisher who grabbed him and yanked him toward her. 
In his new year's wishes to the public in St. Peter's Square on Wednesday, Francis confessed to losing his patience with the woman… [+552 chars]
